param.name: system.php.script
param.spec: text description='PHP script to run' display='normal' label='PHP script:' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: system.php.params
param.spec: text description='Optional PHP parameters' display='normal' label='PHP parameters:' validationMode='any'

parameters.param:
<project name="PHP">
<target name="runPhp"> <exec executable="php" dir="${teamcity.build.workingDir}" failonerror="true"> <arg line="-f "${php.script}" ${php.params}"/> </exec> </target>
</project>
